beers.name: Rye Lager
beers.description: A duo of Indiana and malted rye malts add complexity and color to this cold conditioned Lager, while a duo of old and new hop varieties amplifies the rye spice...

beers.name: MI Pale Ale
beers.description: Balanced foundation of pale barley malt with pineapple, berry and resin from MI grown nugget, chinook and cashmere hops...

beers.name: IPA
beers.description: Pale malt and c-20, ID Chinook, WA Columbus and Cascade…

beers.name: American Bitter
beers.description: UK Fuggle and WA Cascade lay down a leisurely rhythm for the C-60 and biscuit malts to riff on, a simple beer to keep time to…

beers.name: Amber Ale
beers.description: Sugar Creek German style base malts combined with English style caramel malts yield a copperish amber hue, dry hopped with Commet from Loza Farms in WA for an all-American experience…

beers.name: San Diego Pale Ale
beers.description: An absolutely shredding hop load of Columbus, Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo bring the pacific dank to our San Diego inspired pale ale. This one rips...
